description: This taxonomy aims to classify data acquisition tools.

predicates.description: Methods used when acquiring data from memory
Methods used when acquiring data from network

entry.description: LiveCD/LiveUSB for remote forensic acquisition and analysis
Distro for reverse-engineering and analyzing malicious software
Linux distribution for forensic analysis
Linux distribution for forensic analysis
Windows Forensics enviroment
SleuthKit GUI
Forensic framework
Dexter is a forensics acquisition framework designed to be extensible and secure
A tool to analyse files from a forensic acquisition to find known/unknown hashes from [hashlookup(https://www.circl.lu/services/hashlookup/) API or using a local Bloom filter.
IntelMQ collects and processes security feeds
Digital Investigation Platform
Laika is an object scanner and intrusion detection system
PowerForensics is a framework for live disk forensic analysis
TAPIR (Trustable Artifacts Parser for Incident Response) is a multi-user, client/server, incident response framework
Tools for low level forensic analysis
Turbinia is an open-source framework for deploying, managing, and running forensic workloads on cloud platforms
Indexador e Processador de EvidÃªncias Digitais(https://github.com/sepinf-inc/IPED)
Forensic GUI tool
GRR Rapid Response: remote live forensics for incident response
Easy-to-use live forensics toolbox for Linux endpoints written in Python & Flask
Distributed & real time digital forensics at the speed of the cloud
SQL powered operating system analytics
The Penguin OS Flight Recorder collects, stores and organizes for further analysis process execution, file access and network/socket endpoint data from the Linux Operating System.

UAC (Unix-like Artifacts Collector) is a Live Response collection script for Incident Response that makes use of native binaries and tools to automate the collection of AIX, Android, ESXi, FreeBSD, Linux, macOS, NetBSD, NetScaler, OpenBSD and Solaris systems artifacts.
Fast customisable cross-platform suspicious file finder. Supports md5/sha1/sha256 hashes, literal/wildcard strings, regular expressions and YARA rules
Simple Bash IOC Scanner
Simple IOC and Incident Response Scanner
Free endpoint security tool from FireEye
Free IOC and YARA Scanner
Performance oriented file finder with support for SQL querying, index and analyze file metadata with support for YARA.
A customizable agent to collect forensic artifacts on any Windows, macOS or Linux system
Extract common Windows artifacts from source images and VSCs
A portable volatile memory acquisition tool for Linux
Volatile Memory Acquisition Tool
A static host data collection tool by CrowdStrike
Forensics artefact collection tool for systems running Microsoft Windows
Collect artifacts on windows
A free memory forensic software
Loadable Kernel Module (LKM), which allows the acquisition of volatile memory from Linux and Linux-based devices, formerly called DMD
A free imaging tool designed to capture the physical memory
A live forensic collection script for UNIX-like systems as a single script.
Velociraptor is a tool for collecting host based state information using Velocidex Query Language (VQL) queries
Wintriage is a live response tool that extracts Windows artifacts. It must be executed with local or domain administrator privileges and recommended to be done from an external drive.
Improved version of dd
Different improved version of dd (this version has some bugs!, another version is on github [adulau/dcfldd(https://github.com/adulau/dcfldd))
Free imageing tool for windows
Open source version for disk imageing on linux systems
Improved strings utility
Extracts information such as email addresses, creditcard numbers and histrograms from disk images
Static analysis tool to automatically deobfuscate strings from malware binaries
File carving tool
A bash script used to automate Linux swap analysis, automating swap extraction and searches for Linux user credentials, Web form credentials, Web form emails, etc.
High speed memory analysis framework developed in .NET supports all Windows x64, includes code integrity and write support
Extract KeePass passwords from memory
An easy and convenient way of accessing physical memory as files a virtual file system.
Memory Forensic Framework
The memory forensic framework
Web App for Volatility framework
A passive wireless sniffer
Network Forensic Analysis Tool
A network protocol analyzer
Transform data sources and logs into graphs
Cross-platform microsoft registry hive editor
A a sigma-based threat hunting and fast forensics timeline generator for Windows event logs.

LastActivityView by Nirsoftis a tool for Windows operating system that collects information from various sources on a running system, and displays a log of actions made by the user and events occurred on this computer.
Investigate malicious Windows logon by visualizing and analyzing Windows event log
Pure Python parser for classic Windows Event Log files (.evt)
RegRipper is an open source Perl tool for parsing the Registry and presenting it for analysis
A framework for reading and extracting useful forensics data from Windows registry hives
A read-only FUSE driver for the new Apple File System
Extracts forensic artifacts from disk images or live machines
Dump the contents of the location database files on iOS and macOS
Python script to parse the Most Recently Used (MRU) plist files on macOS into a more human friendly format
A software utility with a collection of forensic tools for smartphones
An Android Logs Events and Protobuf Parser
Artifact Examiner for iOS Full File System extractions
An iOS Logs, Events, And Plists Parser
Dump the contents of the StateModel#.archive files located in /private/var/mobile/Library/Caches/com.apple.routined/
Perform different kinds of acquisitions on iOS devices
An automated, all-in-one mobile application (Android/iOS/Windows) pen-testing, malware analysis and security assessment framework capable of performing static and dynamic analysis.
An app for extracting data from iPhone and iPad backups.
Extracts and interprets forensic artifacts from disk images of Docker Host systems
A small utility that reads the cache folder of Google Chrome Web browser, and displays the list of all files currently stored in the cache
Dump all local stored infromation collected by Chrome
Internet history forensics for Google Chrome/Chromium
This tool can parse normal records and recover deleted records in WebCacheV01.dat.
Extract and visualize data from URLs
This tool can parse normal records and recover deleted records in Windows.edb.
Framework for orchestrating forensic collection, processing and data export using GRR and Rekall
Extract timestamps from various files and aggregate them
Timeline Analysis tool for CSV and Excel files. Built for SANS FOR508 students
A rewrite of mactime, a bodyfile reader
Collaborative forensic timeline analysis
A Mac OS X forensic utility designed to help the user ensure correct forensic procedures are followed during imaging of a disk device
Command line utility and Python package to ease the (un)mounting of forensic disk images
Libewf is a library and some tools to access the Expert Witness Compression Format (EWF, E01)
Disk image viewer based in dfvfs, similar to the FTK Imager viewer
Convert between different disk image formats
Fast password cracker with GPU support
Password cracker
Digital Forensics and Incident Response Tracking application, track systems
Web application for organizing non-trivial security investigations. Built on the idea that incidents are trees of tickets, where some tickets are leads
A fully automated tool designed to run forensics analysis over a massive amount of images
An open-source digital photographic image forensic toolset
FOCA is a tool used mainly to find metadata and hidden information in the documents
is a steganography program that hides data in various kinds of image and audio files
is a steganography program that hides data in various kinds of image and audio files
A steganographic coder for WAV files
Mindmap of forensic challenges
Digital forensic course

Online training material by European Union Agency for Network and Information Security for different topics (e.g. [Digital forensics(https://www.enisa.europa.eu/topics/training-and-exercises/trainings-for-cybersecurity-specialists/online-training-material/technical-operational#digital_forensics), [Network forensics(https://www.enisa.europa.eu/topics/training-and-exercises/trainings-for-cybersecurity-specialists/online-training-material/technical-operational#network_forensics))
